metadata.name: The Blockchain
metadata.description:
Provenance  
Inspired by the emergence of Web3, decentralization, community and Art.

Single piece of Black Walnut

6”x6 ½”x(24” high with links extended) x (13 ½” high with links resting)

Hand and Power Carved

Two Fully Free and Articulating Links. 

Total time from Concept to Completion 52 hours

This piece is my physical representation of how I envision the Blockchain and all it represents. Beauty mixed with raw.

The base represents the raw, unfinished, unexpected and sometimes volatile side of Web3. Yet, it is strong and stable, capable of holding the weight of the world.

I kept the base, original mill cut angle offset to provide asymmetry and a more robust statement. Plus, all of us in the space tend to be a bit “off” in good way. Just as important, it mimics the iconic angle of our Web3 rocket.

The freed chain links represent community, the beauty of the positive outcomes Web3 has already given the world.

The links aren’t perfect, and neither are we, but that’s the foundation of our authenticity. We’re forever bound together, holding each other up, allow each other freedom of movement and leave space open as we will always welcome a new link.

Available to ship in the continental US.  
Upon purchase, please email your address information to:  
theblockchaincarving@gmail.com  
Shipping not included
